attributes.description:
Honda Brio/ Amaze Amaze 1.2 Comfort
Beautiful 2021 Amaze in fantastic condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, power steering with controls on steering wheel. Radio with bluetooth and USB. Manual transmission, great fuel consumption and a drive suited for comfort. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book the Amaze for a test drive. Trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.

attributes.description:
Nissan X Trail X Trail 2.5 Acenta Plus 4x4 Cvt 7s
Stunning 2018 X-Trail in excellent condition. Full service history. Aircon, airbag, central locking, radio with bluetooth and USB. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Electric windows and mirrors. Automatic transmission that allows for a smooth and comfortable drive for you and your family to all destinations. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this spacious X-Trail for a test drive. Trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.
